description: You finally made a furnace! Congrats!
You can now get started with basic ore processing. Chuck some raw ore in and see the magic happen! Well...sorta.

Furnaces themselves aren't the most optimized for ore, that's what blast furnaces are for. Be careful what ores you smelt immediately, as they'll only yield a third of their former glory. Take the chunks of smelted ore and put them on a grindstone to get nuggets.
